page.title: 14Youth Club Football
page.content: Saint Philip Evans Youth club has four football teams.Under 10s,under 12A and B,under 14.They all play in the Cardiff and District league. The under 10s team play in red and black.This season they reached five finals but only won one.The team also came runners up in the league.Four of the team were chosen to represent the Cardiff and District side. Both the under 12 teams play in green.The A side were runners up in the league.Though not being successful in the local cup games,the team came runners up in the Boys Clubs of Wales cup competition.The B side came last in the league unfortunately. The under 13 team, who also play in green,only managed to come cup runners up. All teams play at Pontcanna Fields as will an under 14 side next seasons.
